item.title: Climate Quiz

item.title: CentOS Quiz
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: 1 Which configuration file does the OpenSSH daemon use? Show Answer /etc/ssh/sshd_config function showAnswer(divId) { var x = document.getElementById(divId); if (x.style.display === 'none') { x.style.display = 'block'; } else { x.style.display = 'none'; } } 2 What command is used to start the OpenSSH service? item.title: Bio
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: I am a technologist, writer, musician and family man who has spent more than 15 years building software systems. I believe in building software that accurately solves real problems. I’ve built Android apps, Websites, distributed messaging systems, desktop applications and an arduino-based product prototype. Although I do venture into web and mobile development, I spend most of my time and energy building desktop and backend systems in languages like Go, C++, C#, Python etc.
